summary: Etap 3 features testing completed successfully. All 21 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified all new admin panel features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created test blog and FAQ content via API for testing, visible in admin panel

mocked_api.Resend Email API: MOCKED - placeholder key (re_placeholder_key) used, emails logged but not sent

dashboard_stats_endpoint.details: /api/admin/dashboard-stats returns detailed statistics including users, jobs, matches, applications, and category distribution

category_distribution_bar_chart.details: Kategori Dağılımı bar chart displays correctly with category names and counts

summary_cards.details: İş İlanları, Eşleşmeler, Başvurular summary cards display with Toplam, Açık/Aktif/Bekleyen, and status counts

popup_settings_admin.details: Admin can view and update popup settings via /api/admin/popup-settings GET/PUT

popup_settings_public.details: /api/popup-settings returns enabled popup when active, returns {enabled: false} when disabled

popup_form_ui.details: Pop-up Bildirim Ayarları form shows title, content, button text, button link fields with toggles

activity_logs_endpoint.details: /api/admin/activity-logs returns activity logs (empty array when no logs exist)

activity_logs_ui.details: Aktivite Logları tab displays 'Henüz aktivite logu yok' when empty

content_management_tabs.details: İçerik Yönetimi tab shows sub-tabs: Pop-up Bildirimi, Blog Yazıları, Başarı Hikayeleri, Etkinlikler, S.S.S, Aktivite Logları

blog_content_crud.details: Blog content can be created, read, updated, deleted via /api/admin/content endpoints

faq_content_crud.details: FAQ content with question/answer fields can be created and managed

event_content_crud.details: Event content with event_date, event_link, event_type can be created

success_stories_crud.details: Success stories content can be created with is_featured flag

public_content_endpoint.details: /api/content/{type} returns published content for public display

content_management_ui.details: Content items display with Yayında badge, edit and delete buttons

context_for_next_testing_agent: Etap 3 features verified working. Backend API tests in /app/tests/test_etap3_features.py cover dashboard stats, popup settings, activity logs, and content management. Frontend tested via Playwright for admin panel İçerik Yönetimi tab with all sub-tabs. Test blog and FAQ content created during testing are visible in admin panel. Email notifications are MOCKED (Resend API key is placeholder 're_placeholder_key').
